Question
========

To create a new S3 generic function, simply define the function and call ______.

Answerlist
----------
* `UseMethod()`
* `generic()`
* `S3::generic()`
* `base::generic()`

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* No, there is no `generic()` function.
* No, there is no `S3::generic()` function.
* No, there is no `base::generic()` function.
